website_summaries.verdict: This robe is stylish, soft, cozy, and comes at a reasonable price point, making it an impressive buy for any man.
pros: Comes in a classic tartan pattern
Warm and soft on a cold winter’s day
Sizing is generous for added comfort
cons: Belt loops may be weirdly placed for those who are particularly tall

customer_reviews.title: Cozy robe - great fabric
customer_reviews.text: Nice robe for the price. Absolutely does not shed or bleed in washer/dryer. Cozy without being flimsy. My picky husband likes it! The XL is roomy but not too big for him at 6"1' and 215 lbs. Just wish it was made in USA instead of China - I would pay more for that. I couldn't find any robes like this made in USA. I also wish Amazon would let me filter by country of origin.
customer_reviews.author: Every Woman

customer_reviews.title: He Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: He loves this robe. It's amazing he even tried it on since he had an emotional attachment to his old robe. It took a week or more for him to give it a try. When he came down with a cold he showed up in this new robe saying he loved it. It is very cozy according to Jeff and he has been wearing it every morning since that day. It fits great. He is 5'11" and 74 years old with a tummy that comes with getting older and it fits just fine. I'm glad I choose it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnee

customer_reviews.title: Nice robe, but check the quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought the L/XL for my 15 year old who is 6'2" and 190 lbs. It fits him well and we both love the colors. It's soft and a medium weight for warmth (not too heavy and not too light). He's been wearing it almost every day to and from the shower as well as at night when he plays video games. Something to check for though -- ours came with a hole in the pocket! I'm gonna hand sew it to avoid the hassle of returning but it really needs better quality control! Deducted a star for the hole but otherwise nice robe.
